high_descs: turn right, walk to the desk
pick up the clock that is on the desk
take two steps to the left to face the lamp, hold the clock up
anns.task_desc: examine a clock with a lamp

high_descs: Go to the right and stand in front of the desk.
Pick up the clock from the desk.
Move to the left and stand at the desk in front of the lamp.
Turn the lamp on the desk on.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a clock and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Turn to the right and go to the desk in front of you
Pick up the clock that is sitting on the desk
Take a step to the left and continue to face the desk
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine a clock by the light of a lamp
